title: Captain Planet
recommendations: Pet your cat 50 times after a blue-green deployment.
Take computer breaks to rest your eyes.

title: Planeteer
recommendations: Burp into your CPU so you can reuse energy.
Sing lullabies to your active EC2 instances during uptime.

title: Hoggish Greedly
recommendations: Dedicate an S3 bucket in your organisation to storing memes
